passing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the passing of something is the fact that it has ended
passing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The old regime was defeated, and few people mourned its passing.
passing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the passing of a person is their death – use this when you want to avoid using the word ‘death’
passing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Nothing could fill the gap in her life left by his passing.
passing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: going past a place or person
passing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A passing motorist stopped to help.
passing.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a passing thought or feeling is short and not very serious
passing.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: He had only ever shown a passing interest in sport.
passing.translation[1].definitions[2].de: a passing remark is one that you make while you are talking about something else
passing.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: He made only a passing reference to her achievements.
